ThingDef.label: valhallan garrison cap
ThingDef.description: A garrison cap with a chin strap, worn by Valhallan Ice Warriors. No winter wind will disturb it from its place on the wearer’s head. \n\nThe greatest nemesis of the Valhallans are the Orks, for it was they who invaded the planet during a time of grave food shortages. The desperate struggle for food and shelter against the cold made the Ice Warriors into expert Ork-slayers.

ThingDef.label: valhallan ushanka
ThingDef.description: A furred hat with earflaps, best worn in cold weather. Valhallan Ice Warriors typically eschew metal helmets, which chill easily and can stick painfully to skin. \n\nSome Valhallan Guardsmen have made tentative, but friendly contact with tribes and outlanders living in the colder regions. Although the Guardsmen are intimidating with their uniforms and (relatively) high-tech weaponry, the overall feeling is that the ice and snow makes an equal of them all.

ThingDef.label: Valhallan officer ushanka
ThingDef.description:
A variant of the normal Valhallan ushanka. The untrained eye can distinguish little between them, but any Valhallan Guardsman knows an officer’s hat when they see one. 

The Valhallan 597th Regiment has the honor of being the home unit of Commissar Ciaphas Cain - Hero of the Imperium - for many years. A fusion of two sundered regiments, there was at first much friction between the combined Guardsmen, even to the point of violence. 

The Commissar, upon his arrival in the middle of a riot, forced them to integrate at the squad level and heavily incentivised teamwork in combat exercises. By the time of their first deployment on Gravalax, the 597th was completely combat-effective.
